Description: This package is base on the [***Opinionated Umbraco Package Starter Template***](https://github.com/idseefeld/opinionated-package-starter) official [*Umbraco Extensions*](https://github.com/umbraco/Umbraco-CMS/tree/contrib/templates/UmbracoExtension) template gives you a starting point with additional examples for advanced Block Grid views within the backoffice.
Title: WYSIWG in the Umbraco Backoffice

Screenshots.Description: Block Grid View - backoffice vs frontend
